title: Configure Tailwind CSS
description: Set up Tailwind CSS for styling with proper configuration and optimization settings

user_stories: As a frontend developer, I want Tailwind CSS configured so that I can style components efficiently
As a designer, I need a consistent styling system so that the UI looks professional and cohesive
business_rules: Tailwind CSS must be properly configured for the project
Purge configuration must be set up for production builds
Custom theme settings must align with design requirements
edge_cases: Handling different breakpoints for responsive design

acceptance_criteria: Tailwind CSS is properly installed and configured
Purge configuration is set up for production
Styling works correctly in development and production builds

additional_context.technical_notes: Follow Tailwind CSS best practices for configuration. Ensure proper purge settings for production builds to optimize bundle size.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure no sensitive information is exposed through CSS classes
